DOC.brief_summary: Therapeutic hypothermia out-of-hospital cardiac arrest consider standard care . However , optimal candidate , optimal dose , duration , time initiation rate rewarming still unknown . The objective project improve outcome patient resuscitation out-of-hospital cardiac arrest treat therapeutic hypothermia establish analysis multicenter registry data .
DOC.brief_title: A Prospective , Multicenter Registry With Targeted Temperature Management After Out-of-hospital Cardiac Arrest Korea
DOC.criteria: age old 18 year outofhospital cardiac arrest comatose mentality return spontaneous circulation ( ROSC ) treat therapeutic hypothermia , regardless target temperature suspect confirmed cerebrovascular accident poor prearrest neurologic status ( CPC > 3 ) patient terminally ill intensive care dose seem appropriate Do attempt resuscitation ( DNAR ) order patient tympanic membrane temperature 30 degree celsius admission
